024package mod.deplayer.coffeechat.coffeeirc.client;
025
026import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
028import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
029import java.net.URI;
030import java.net.http.HttpClient;
031import java.net.http.HttpRequest;
032import java.net.http.HttpResponse;
033import java.io.*;
034import java.time.Duration;
035import java.time.LocalDateTime;
036import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
037import java.time.LocalDate;
038import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpServer;
039import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler;
040import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange;
041
042/**CIC客户端核心*/
043public class Client {
044
045    private static final Logger cml = LogManager.getLogger(Client.class);
046
047    private String DistributionName;
048
049    private String ip;
050
051    private int port;
052
053    private int ipProtocol;
054
055    private String nickname;
056
057    private String username;
058        
059    private String servername;
060        
061    private String serverdescription;
062        
063    private String clientId;
064        
065    private boolean isConnected = false;
066    
067
068    private PrintWriter chatLogWriter;
069    private String currentChatLogDate;
070    private DateTimeFormatter chatLogFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
071    
072
073    private HttpServer pushServer;
074    private int pushPort = 10026;
075        
076    private HttpClient clientHttp = HttpClient.newHttpClient();
077    
078    public Client(int ipProtocol, String ip, int port, String nickname, String username, String DistributionName) {
079        cml.info("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
080        cml.info("[核心信息]正在使用的CoffeeIRC核心的软件信息:");
081        cml.info("        版本号: " + SwInfoc.version);
082        cml.info("        开发状态: " + SwInfoc.softwareStatus);
083        cml.info("        版本代号: " + SwInfoc.VerCodename);
084        cml.info("        支持协议: " + SwInfoc.connection);
085        cml.info("");
086        cml.info("当前运行本核心的发行版: " + DistributionName);
087        cml.info("");
088        cml.info("如果遇到核心问题，请提交至: https://github.com/deplayeris/coffeeirc/issues");
089        cml.info("如在使用基于本核心的发行版(如无忧聊)时出现问题");
090        cml.info("请先检查是否为核心故障(通过查看核心日志)，若非核心问题请联系发行版作者");
091        cml.info("");
092        cml.info("核心问题提交步骤:");
093        cml.info("1. 在GitHub上创建新的Issue");
094        cml.info("2. 详细准确地描述遇到的问题");
095        cml.info("3. 附上出现问题时的核心日志文件");
096        cml.info("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
097        this.ipProtocol = ipProtocol;
098        this.ip = ip;
099        this.port = port;
100        this.nickname = nickname;
101        this.username = username;
102        cml.info("[客户端初始化] 开始创建客户端实例");
103        cml.info("[配置详情] IP协议版本: IPv" + ipProtocol);
104        cml.info("[配置详情] 服务器地址: " + ip + ":" + port);
105        cml.info("[用户信息] 用户昵称: " + nickname);
106        cml.info("[用户信息] 用户名: " + username);
107        cml.info("[实例创建] 客户端实例已成功创建并配置完成");
108
109        initializeChatLog();
110
111        startPushService();
112
113    }
114    /**记录聊天日志所必须要使用的一个Method*/
115    private void initializeChatLog() {
116        try {
117            currentChatLogDate = LocalDate.now().toString();
118            String logFileName = "./ciclogs/chatlog-c-" + currentChatLogDate + ".log";
119            FileWriter fileWriter = new FileWriter(logFileName, true);
120            chatLogWriter = new PrintWriter(fileWriter, true);
121            
122            cml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志系统已初始化，日志文件: " + logFileName);
123            
124        } catch (IOException e) {
125            cml.error("[聊天日志错误] 初始化聊天日志失败: " + e.getMessage());
126        }
127    }
128
129    ///记录聊天消息
130    /// @param username 用户名
131    /// @param message 消息
132    private void logChatMessage(String username, String message) {
133        try {
134            String today = LocalDate.now().toString();
135            if (!today.equals(currentChatLogDate)) {
136                closeChatLog();
137                initializeChatLog();
138            }
139            
140            if (chatLogWriter != null) {
141                String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(chatLogFormatter);
142                String logEntry = timestamp + " [ " + username + " ] " + message;
143                chatLogWriter.println(logEntry);
144                chatLogWriter.flush();
145            }
146        } catch (Exception e) {
147            cml.error("[聊天日志错误] 记录聊天消息失败: " + e.getMessage());
148        }
149    }
150
151    /**在使用完毕之后，必须关闭聊天日志记录*/
152    private void closeChatLog() {
153        if (chatLogWriter != null) {
154            chatLogWriter.close();
155            chatLogWriter = null;
156            cml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志文件已关闭");
157        }
158    }
159
160    /**这个推送服务是用来接收服务器广播消息、客户端发送请求到服务端执行动作的，因此，必须启动*/
161    private void startPushService() {
162        try {
163            pushServer = HttpServer.create(new InetSocketAddress(pushPort), 0);
164            pushServer.createContext("/push", new PushHandler());
165            pushServer.setExecutor(null);
166            pushServer.start();
167            cml.info("[推送服务] 推送服务已在端口 " + pushPort + " 启动");
168        } catch (IOException e) {
169            cml.error("[推送服务错误] 启动推送服务失败: " + e.getMessage());
170        }
171    }
172
173    /**在使用完毕之后，必须关闭推送服务*/
174    private void stopPushService() {
175        if (pushServer != null) {
176            pushServer.stop(0);
177            pushServer = null;
178            cml.info("[推送服务] 推送服务已停止");
179        }
180    }
181
182    /**推送处理器类*/
183    class PushHandler implements HttpHandler {
184        @Override
185        /**处理推送消息的处理器*/
186        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
187            //至于为什么使用 push 而不使用 pull这个命名，这是受到 github 的熏陶（pull request就是由push者发送）
188            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
189                try {
190                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
191                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
192                    inputStream.close();
193                    
194                    cml.info("[推送接收] 收到推送消息: " + requestBody);
195                    
196                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\"}";
197                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
198                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
199                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
200                    os.write(response.getBytes());
201                    os.close();
202                    
203                } catch (Exception e) {
204                    cml.error("[推送错误] 处理推送消息时出错: " + e.getMessage());
205                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\"}";
206                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
207                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
208                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
209                    os.write(response.getBytes());
210                    os.close();//这里就是一坨灾难
211                }
212            } else {
213                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
214                exchange.close();
215            }
216        }
217    }
218
219    /**连接*/
220    public void Connect() {
221        cml.info("[连接] 尝试连接到服务器 http://" + ip + ":" + port + " (用户: " + username + ")");
222        
223        try {
224            String serverUrl = "http://" + ip + ":" + port;
225            HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
226                    .uri(URI.create(serverUrl + "/connect"))
227                    .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(30))
228                    .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
229                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(
230                            "{\"nickname\":\"" + nickname + "\",\"username\":\"" + username + "\"}"))
231                    .build();
232            
233            HttpResponse<String> response = clientHttp.send(request, 
234                    HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
235            
236            if (response.statusCode() == 200) {
237
238                String responseBody = response.body();
239                if (responseBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
240                    int start = responseBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
241                    int end = responseBody.indexOf("\"", start);
242                    if (end > start) {
243                        clientId = responseBody.substring(start, end);
244                        isConnected = true;
245                        cml.info("[连接成功] 已连接到服务器，客户端ID: " + clientId);
246                    }
247                } else {
248                    cml.warn("[警告] 服务器未返回客户端ID");
249                    isConnected = true;
250                }
251            } else {
252                cml.error("[连接失败] 状态码: " + response.statusCode() + ", 响应: " + response.body());
253            }
254            
255        } catch (Exception e) {
256            cml.error("[连接异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
257            if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
258                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
259            }
260        }
261    }
262
263    /// 发送消息
264    /// @param message 要发送的消息
265    public void sendMessage(String message) {
266        if (!isConnected) {
267            cml.warn("[发送失败] 客户端未连接");
268            return;
269        }
270        
271        cml.info("[发送] '" + nickname + "' 发送消息: " + message);
272        
273
274        logChatMessage(nickname, message);
275        
276        try {
277            String serverUrl = "http://" + ip + ":" + port;
278            String requestBody = "{\"nickname\":\"" + nickname + "\",\"message\":\"" + message + "\"";
279            
280
281            if (clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()) {
282                requestBody = requestBody.substring(0, requestBody.length() - 1) + ",\"clientId\":\"" + clientId + "\"}";
283            }
284            
285            HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
286                    .uri(URI.create(serverUrl + "/message"))
287                    .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(10))
288                    .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
289                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(requestBody))
290                    .build();
291            
292            HttpResponse<String> response = clientHttp.send(request, 
293                    HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
294            
295            if (response.statusCode() == 200) {
296                cml.info("[发送成功] 消息已送达服务器");
297            } else {
298                cml.error("[发送失败] 状态码: " + response.statusCode() + ", 响应: " + response.body());
299            }
300            
301        } catch (Exception e) {
302            cml.error("[发送异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
303            if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
304                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
305            }
306        }
307    }
308
309    /**断开连接*/
310    public void disconnect() {
311        if (!isConnected) {
312            cml.warn("[断开失败] 客户端未连接");
313            return;
314        }
315
316        cml.info("[断开] '" + nickname + "' 正在断开连接");
317
318        try {
319            String serverUrl = "http://" + ip + ":" + port;
320            String requestBody = "{\"nickname\":\"" + nickname + "\"";
321
322            if (clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()) {
323                requestBody = requestBody.substring(0, requestBody.length() - 1) + ",\"clientId\":\"" + clientId + "\"}";
324            }
325
326            HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
327                    .uri(URI.create(serverUrl + "/disconnect"))
328                    .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(10))
329                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(requestBody))
330                    .build();
331
332            HttpResponse<String> response = clientHttp.send(request,
333                    HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
334
335            if (response.statusCode() == 200) {
336                cml.info("[断开成功] 已从服务器断开");
337
338                isConnected = false;
339                clientId = null;
340                closeChatLog();
341                stopPushService();
342                stopPushService();
343            } else {
344                cml.warn("[断开异常] 状态码: " + response.statusCode());
345                isConnected = false;
346                clientId = null;
347                closeChatLog();
348                stopPushService();
349            }
350
351        } catch (Exception e) {
352            cml.error("[断开异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
353            isConnected = false;
354            clientId = null;
355            closeChatLog();
356            stopPushService();
357            
358            if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
359                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
360            }
361        }
362
363    }
